alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:27PM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Garrett Co. in Maryland, Western Highland Co. in Virginia, and western Grant and western Pendleton Co. in West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon and Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will pick back up again from mid- afternoon through tonight. Wind chills will also hover between 5 to -5 degrees below zero.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
